segments.text: Everything in this kitchen seems ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces the sink, towel in hand on the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the faucet's on, and water's overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring down the front, hitting the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware, one foot already wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the left, the cabinet's open to the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs the two-step stool, reaching in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's unstable, legs spread wide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got a plate in his other hand too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is beside him, arm up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're clearly in on this cookie heist together.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view outside adds a nice touch of calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a surprisingly chaotic domestic moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
